mapper.select: select ac.seq_member seqMember, ac.member_email_id memberEmailId, ac.member_name memberName, ac.member_phoneNo memberPhoneNo, ac.member_gender memberGender, DATE_FORMAT(ac.member_birthdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS memberBirthdate, a.seq_animal seqAnimal, a.animal_name animalName, DATE_FORMAT(a.animal_age, '%Y-%m-%d') AS animalAge, a.animal_type animalType, a.animal_size animalSize, a.animal_gender animalGender, a.animal_weight animalWeight, a.animal_picture animalPicture, a.animal_video animalVideo, a.animal_picture_path animalPicturePath, a.animal_video_path animalVideoPath from account ac, animal a where ac.seq_member = a.seq_member and ac.seq_member = #{seqMember}

select ac.seq_member seqMember, a.seq_animal seqAnimal, a.animal_name animalName, d.seq_diagnosis seqDiagnosis, d.seq_animal_hospital seqAnimalHospital, ah.animal_hospital_name animalHospitalName, DATE_FORMAT(d.diagnosis_date, '%Y-%m-%d') diagnosisDate, d.diagnosis_symptom diagnosisSymptom from account ac, animal a, diagnosis d, animalhospital ah where ac.seq_member = a.seq_member and d.seq_animal = a.seq_animal and d.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital and ac.seq_member = #{seqMember} ORDER BY d.diagnosis_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into animal (seq_member, animal_name, animal_type, animal_size, animal_weight, animal_age, animal_gender, animal_join_date, animal_update_date, animal_important_symptom, animal_picture, animal_video, animal_picture_path, animal_video_path ) values (#{seqMember}, #{animalName}, #{animalType}, #{animalSize}, #{animalWeight}, #{animalAge}, #{animalGender}, now(), now(), #{animalImportantSymptom}, #{animalPicture}, #{animalVideo}, #{animalPicturePath}, #{animalVideoPath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE animal SET animal_name = #{animalName}, animal_type = #{animalType}, animal_size = #{animalSize}, animal_age = #{animalAge}, animal_weight = #{animalWeight}, animal_update_date = NOW(), animal_picture = #{animalPicture}, animal_video = #{animalVideo}, animal_picture_path = #{animalPicturePath}, animal_video_path = #{animalVideoPath} WHERE seq_animal = #{seqAnimal}
mapper.select: SELECT a.seq_member AS seqMember, a.seq_animal AS seqAnimal, d.seq_diagnosis AS seqDiagnosis, ah.seq_animal_hospital AS seqAnimalHospital, a.animal_name AS animalName, d.diagnosis_symptom AS diagnosisSymptom, ah.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName, DATE_FORMAT(d.diagnosis_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS diagnosisDate FROM diagnosis as d JOIN animal as a ON d.seq_animal = a.seq_animal JOIN animalhospital as ah ON ah.seq_animal_hospital = d.seq_animal_hospital join account as ac on ac.seq_member = a.seq_member WHERE a.seq_member = #{seqMember} ORDER BY d.diagnosis_date desc

select dia.seq_diagnosis seqDiagnosis, DATE_FORMAT(dia.diagnosis_date, '%Y-%m-%d') diagnosisDate, ah.animal_hospital_name animalHospitalName, ac.member_name memberName, a.animal_name animalName, dia.diagnosis_symptom diagnosisSymptom, dia.diagnosis_medication_way diagnosisMedicationWay, a.seq_animal seqAnimal, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y') - DATE_FORMAT(a.animal_age, '%y') AS animalAge, a.animal_type animalType, a.animal_size animalSize, a.animal_weight animalWeight from diagnosis dia, doctor d, animalhospital ah , animal a , account ac where dia.seq_doctor = d.seq_doctor and dia.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital and dia.seq_animal = a.seq_animal and d.seq_member = ac.seq_member and dia.seq_diagnosis = #{seqDiagnosis} AND a.seq_member = #{seqMember} AND a.seq_animal = #{seqAnimal}

select d.seq_diagnosis seqDiagnosis, dm.seq_medicine seqMedicine, m.medicine_manufacture_company medicineManufactureCompany, m.medicine_name medicineName, m.medicine_medication_guide medicineMedicationGuide, m.medicine_side_effect medicineSideEffect from diagnosis d , diagnosis_medicine dm , medicine m where d.seq_diagnosis = dm.seq_diagnosis and dm.seq_medicine = m.seq_medicine and d.seq_diagnosis = #{seqDiagnosis}
